decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (3196 - 01/FP, 3196 - 02/FP, 3196 - 03/FP, 3196 - 04/FP, 3196 - 05/FP, 3196 - 06/FP, 3196 - 07/FP and 3196 - 08/FP Received: 5 April 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The resultant property shall not be occupied other than as a single family dwellinghouse (Use Class C3).
description: Proposed Loft Conversion with Rear Dormer and front roof lights, Part First Floor Rear Extension, Garage Conversion to Habitable Room with new roof over the rear/side extensions and Internal Alterations.
